hero_text: From idea to execution... We provide everything you need for your business success under one roof with the highest standards of quality and professionalism
about_subtitle: A full-service company offering comprehensive solutions for all your business needs
about_paragraph_1: SQUARE EXCELLENCE was established to be your ideal partner in starting and operating your business. We offer a complete package of commercial, logistical, technical, and accounting services under one roof.
about_paragraph_2: With our professional team and the latest technologies, we ensure innovative solutions that meet all your business needs—from the startup phase to operation and continuous success.
services_subtitle: We offer a wide range of professional services to meet all your business needs
service_1_description: From the idea to a legally operating entity
service_1_list_2: Issuance of commercial registration and legal licenses
service_1_list_3: Opening Zakat, tax, and social insurance files

portfolio_project_1_desc: Execution of a luxury 600 m² villa in North Riyadh

why_subtitle: We’re not just a service provider — we’re your reliable success partner.
why_point_1_desc: No need to deal with multiple providers we handle everything from setup to operation under one roof.
why_point_2_desc: We adhere to the highest standards across all our services, with clear warranties and complete transparency.
why_point_3_desc: Your satisfaction matters even after service delivery. Our team is available 24/7 to ensure your ideal experience and answer any inquiries.
why_point_4_desc: With a proven track record in diverse industries, we bring deep practical expertise that guarantees precise solutions and real results.
why_point_5_desc: Flexible offers tailored to your budget — without compromising on quality.
why_point_6_desc: Certified experts across accounting, construction, technology, and logistics.
faq_subtitle: Clear answers to your most common inquiries.
faq_q1: How long does it take to establish a new company?
faq_a1: The process typically takes 3 to 10 business days, depending on the business type and the completeness of documents.
faq_q2: Do you offer warranties on construction work?
faq_a2: Yes, our construction projects include up to 5 years of structural warranty and 1 year for finishes.
faq_q3: How can I track my logistics shipments?
faq_a3: We provide real-time tracking via a link we send you, along with regular updates via WhatsApp.
faq_q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_a4: We accept cash, bank transfers, and credit cards (for large-scale projects).
faq_a5: Yes, we offer annual maintenance contracts that include regular visits and discounts on spare parts.
faq_cta: Didn't find the answer you're looking for?
contact_subtitle: We’re here to help with any inquiry or service request.

footer_about_text: Square Excellence Co. Ltd. offers comprehensive solutions for company formation, commercial, logistics, technical, and accounting services under one roof.
